text:
doing an optimization problem and I've tried three different optimization packages and they all do the same thing. No matter what I do they'll do one iteration and not do anymore, and say that the optimization was a success even though I know there's a lot better solutions literally next to it. I know for a fact this isn't the global optima that I'm using for the initial guess either.

Here's a quick look at the objective function for Optim.jl
```function optim(beta, Trxn, pA, pHYD, pIPOH, FIPOHOUT, case)
    
    STYAMOD, fail = MODEL(beta, Trxn, pA, pHYD, pIPOH, case)

    if fail[1] == false 
        resid   = log10.(STYAMOD) .- log10.(FIPOHOUT)
        return sum(resid.^2)
    else 
        return Inf
    end
end```

function optim(beta, Trxn, pA, pHYD, pIPOH, FIPOHOUT, case)
    
    STYAMOD, fail = MODEL(beta, Trxn, pA, pHYD, pIPOH, case)

    if fail[1] == false 
        resid   = log10.(STYAMOD) .- log10.(FIPOHOUT)
        return sum(resid.^2)
    else 
        return Inf
    end
end
